availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gabriel Fletcher Rabb (Paducah, Kentucky, grocery clerk)

body.p: Paducah, Kentucky, grocery clerk. Mississippi native. Married to Mary Cattell Vontress Rabb in Union County, Kentucky on December 19, 1850. Father of Mary V., Fanny B., Nina B., Eloise F, and Nanny Rabb. Farmer in McCracken County, Kentucky in 1850. Grocery clerk in Paducah, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken, District 2, p. 168B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken, Paducah, p. 893.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken, Paducah, p. 168A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film # 545986.
